segments.text: Let's have a look at the map first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Wukesong stop is quite a few stops from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The train is coming . There are a lot of people waiting here . let's stand in a better position to get on the train
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's not as crowded as we expected , is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but it will be soon . Look , there're two empty seats over there . Let's get them .
segments.speaker: S2
